name: The Grand Carpet Hotel
description:
made for ludum dare 32

A game in an Hotel with Carpets

Made in 72h with herbal tea, proud and fun by: Anabelle, dunin, Lucile, trouba and Thomas.
Thanks to these tools: Phaser, GraphicsGale, Tiled and Audacity.
Inspired by the aesethics and fun of the film The Grand Budapest Hotel by Wes Anderson.
